scripts.deploy-compound: cd compound-protocol && PROVIDER='http://localhost:8545/' yarn run repl -s script/scen/scriptFlywheel.scen
scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd compound-protocol && yarn && cd scenario && yarn
scripts.clean: rimraf build && rimraf types && rimraf cache && rimraf artifacts
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run gen-typings
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run build-compound && npm run build
scripts.clean-snapshot: rimraf snapshot/coverage && rimraf snapshot/compound && rimraf snapshot/bcompound
scripts.coverage: FILE=coverage npm run clean-snapshot && FILE=coverage npm run unzip-snapshot && npm run copy-coverage-files && npm run exec-coverage
scripts.load-snapshot: echo $FILE && npm run clean-snapshot && npm run unzip-snapshot && npm run start-ganache
scripts.start-ganache: echo $FILE && npx ganache-cli -l 1250000000000 --allowUnlimitedContractSize -a 20  -e 100000000000000  -m 'bonus patient judge normal delay supreme sentence confirm fox desk cool estate' --db './snapshot/'$FILE
